name: unostentatiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not obviously show your money, possessions, or power, because you are not interested in making other people notice or admire you: They are very wealthy, but live relatively unostentatiously in a small town. She always dressed unostentatiously, often in black.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was unostentatiously dressed, considering his background.His later years were lived almost as plainly and unostentatiously as those he had spent working as a miner.I entered the restaurant as unostentatiously as I could manage.In many cases she had quietly and unostentatiously given food, clothing, and similar comforts to the poor.
